text.more: This Norwegian hyperlink network consist of various nodes representing different sectors of society, including academia, industry, startups, and government. These nodes are linked together using hyperlinks, allowing users to easily navigate between them and access information related to each sector. For example, a node representing academia include links to research institutions and universities, while a node representing industry include links to Norwegian businesses, clusters and organisations. A node representing startups include links to resources and support for entrepreneurs, and a node representing government include links to government agencies and official information. This hyperlink network provides a convenient and efficient way for users to access a wide range of information related to Norwegian academia, industry, startups, and government.
text.intro: This Norwegian hyperlink network consist of various nodes representing different sectors of society, including academia, industry, startups, and government. It represented a curated network of web entities related to the field of artificial intelligence in Norway.
text.title: Norwegian AI Hyperlink Network
